title: The Music — And Mess — In Ben Watt's Long Goodbye To His Father
teaser: Ben Watt is a singer and DJ, best known for being in the British pop duo Everything but the Girl. Now, he's back with a new album and a book that gives an inside look at his complicated relationship with his parents.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
